snippet.title: RPG Dark Gate - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Destroy the Dark Gate!
"RPG Dark Gate" now available for Android™ and for iPhone/iPod Touch™

Like our Facebook page to get the latest information!
http://www.facebook.com/kemco.global

Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=kemco.hitpoint.darkgate
App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/rpgdakugeto/id481618630?mt=8
Official Page: http://www.kemco.jp/sp/games/dg/en/index.html


-About the Game
Monsters who should be sealed away have reappeared on the continent, causing an uproar amongst the people.
Each guild has identified the cause of the monsters
to be abnormal spacial rifts known as "Dark Gates",
and must work together to destroying the Dark Gates.
A young lad named Leo has been assigned by a guild
with this important task.
Meet allies from across the land, each with their own back story.
Some collide head to head with Leo, but they stand together with the common goal of destroying the Dark Gates!

-AUTOMATED & HIGH-PACED GAMEPLAY BATTLES
-OVER 70 JOB CLASSES
-HIGH REPLAY VALUE WITH MULTIPLE ENDINGS


©2010-2011 KEMCO / Hit-Point
※ All graphics, terms, characters and elements may have possibility to be modified in the actual product.
